citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
October 20, 2020.
The inspector left a message at the phone number on file, sent a message to the email on file, and waited 30 minutes
before leaving. The office door had a sign indicating that the building was closed.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on 
October 20, 2020. 
 
The inspector left a message at the phone number on file, sent a message to the email on file, and waited 30 minutes 
before leaving.  The office door had a sign indicating that the building was closed. 
 
 
 
End Section
